title: Down the Rabbit Hole: Alice's Jobless Wonderland

shots.visual: Stunning young Asian woman (mid-20s, long silky black hair, delicate features, wearing a simple white blouse and skirt) sitting alone in a modern apartment, staring at a laptop screen showing a layoff email, expression shifting from shock to despair
shots.camera: Slow push in from wide shot of the room to extreme close-up on her teary eyes
shots.dialogue: Alice (soft whisper, breaking voice): "...Due to restructuring... your position has been eliminated..."

shots.visual: Alice walking aimlessly through a lush city park in golden afternoon light, looking lost and frustrated, kicking lightly at fallen leaves
shots.camera: Steadicam tracking beside her, keeping her in medium shot
shots.dialogue: Alice (muttering to herself): "What now? Everything gone... just like that."

shots.visual: A white rabbit in a waistcoat frantically checks a pocket watch, muttering 'I'm late!', then hops toward a large tree with a glowing hole at its base; Alice spots it with wide-eyed curiosity
shots.camera: Low-angle shot emphasizing the rabbit's urgency, then whip pan to Alice's surprised reaction
shots.dialogue: White Rabbit: "I'm late! I'm late! For a very important date!"

shots.visual: Alice runs after the rabbit, hair flowing, reaching the tree just as the rabbit vanishes into the hole; she peers in, loses balance, and tumbles forward
shots.camera: Handheld chase shot building speed, ending in POV of falling

shots.visual: Surreal slow-motion fall down the endless rabbit hole: Alice tumbling gracefully past floating clocks, resumes, briefcases, and office chairs
shots.camera: 360-degree rotating shot around Alice, emphasizing her startled yet beautiful expression

shots.visual: Alice lands softly in a dimly lit hall lined with doors of all sizes; she finds a tiny bottle labeled 'Drink Me' and a cake labeled 'Eat Me', hesitates, then drinks and shrinks dramatically
shots.camera: Wide establishing shot, then rapid zoom out as she shrinks
shots.dialogue: Alice (nervous): "Well... what have I got to lose?"

shots.visual: Tiny Alice enters a vibrant oversized garden; talking flowers gossip about 'job prospects' while a grinning Cheshire Cat materializes on a branch above her
shots.camera: Low-angle dolly through giant flowers up to the cat's mischievous smile
shots.dialogue: Cheshire Cat: "Lost your way? Or perhaps... you're looking for a new one?"

shots.visual: Chaotic Mad Tea Party: Alice seated at a long cluttered table with the eccentric Mad Hatter and March Hare arguing about deadlines while pouring endless tea
shots.camera: Circular orbit around the table, capturing the madness and Alice's growing confusion
shots.dialogue: Mad Hatter: "No time! No time! Always deadlines but never any time!"

shots.visual: Croquet game on a bizarre lawn: Alice awkwardly swinging a flamingo mallet at a hedgehog ball while the furious Queen of Hearts screams 'Off with her contract!'
shots.camera: Dynamic tracking shot following the hedgehog, keeping Alice in frame
shots.dialogue: Queen of Hearts: "Off with her contract! Off with her benefits!"

shots.visual: Alice eats a piece of mushroom, grows enormous, towers over the card soldiers and Queen, confidently declares 'I'm done playing your games', then everything begins to blur as she wakes
shots.camera: Extreme low angle making Alice gigantic, then slow pull back as scene dissolves
shots.dialogue: Alice (confident, powerful): "I'm done playing your games. I make my own rules now."
